name: Bit Bunny
description:
Bit Bunny is a short platformer made for the Bitter Jam. 

Controls:

Arrows to move, space to jump, and r to restart the level

Sidenotes:

In all honesty, I had bigger plans for this but work snuck up on me and I didn't have as much time as I thought I did to work on it. That said, I'm glad I was able to release something in the time I had.

Credits:

The graphics are credited to the host of Bitter Jam, and the music and sound effects are credit to Zapsplat. All code is written by me, and is released under the GPLv3. Special thanks to love2d for creating such a cool library.
